A.name: Special rail car order, schedule increase forecast change
A.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to special rail car
                                    order, schedule increase forecast change.

B.name: Engineering change or late release
B.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to engineering change
                                    or late release.

C.name: Specification (schedule) error/overbuilding
C.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to special rail car
                                    order, schedule increase forecast change specification (schedule)
                                    error/overbuilding.

D.name: Shipment tracing delay
D.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to shipment tracing
                                    delay.

E.name: Plant inventory loss
E.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to plant inventory
                                    loss.

F.name: Building ahead of schedule
F.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to building ahead of
                                    schedule.

G.name: Vendor behind schedule
G.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to vendor behind
                                    schedule.

H.name: Failed to include in last shipment
H.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to failure to include
                                    costs in last shipment.

I.name: Carrier loss claim
I.desc: The reason for the excess transportation is due to carrier loss claim.

J.name: Transportation failure
J.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to transportation
                                    failure.

K.name: Insufficient weight for carload
K.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to insufficient weight
                                    for carload.

L.name: Reject or discrepancy (material rejected in prior shipment)
L.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to reject or
                                    discrepancy.

M.name: Transportation delay
M.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to transportation
                                    delay.

N.name: Lack of railcar or railroad equipment
N.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to lack of railcar of
                                    railroad equipment.

P.name: Releasing error
P.desc: The reason for the excess transportation is due to releasing error.

R.name: Record error or cate reported discrepancy report
R.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to record error or
                                    cate reported discrepancy report.

T.name: Common or peculiar part schedule increase
T.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to common or peculiar
                                    part schedule increase.

U.name: Alternative supplier shipping for responsible supplier
U.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to alternative
                                    supplier shipping for responsible supplier.

V.name: Direct schedule or locally controlled
V.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to direct schedule or
                                    locally controlled.

W.name: Purchasing waiver approval
W.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to purchasing waiver
                                    approved.

X.name: Authorization code to be determined
X.desc:
The reason for the excess transportation is due to authorization code
                                    to be determined.

Y.name: Pilot material
Y.desc: The reason for the excess transportation is due to pilot material.

ZZZ.name: Mutually defined
ZZZ.desc:
A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and
                                    as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code
                                    list.
